description: Gate validation checkpoint performed during inbound or outbound processing.

laneId.description: Lane or channel identifier within the gate.

status.description: initiated, in_progress, completed, failed, cancelled, verified, denied, manual_review.

gateVisitId.description: Gate visit reference if linked to a visit.

verifiedIdentifiers.description: Matched ANPR, RFID, and QR identifiers.

failureReasonCode.description: Failure reason code when the check is rejected.

failureDetails.description: Additional failure detail or operator notes.

manualOverride.description: Indicates if an override was used to proceed.
